game_description: V20 Cricket is the best Virtual reality cricket game for all ages! Welcome to the future of cricket. In this immersive Virtual cricket simulator, you can bat in different match scenarios, chase down targets and be the master of your own stadium! You’re front and centre, in a true to life stadium with panoramic 360 degree views. World-class bowling, phenomenal fielding and a 100,000 roaring fans with just two overs to go ⁃ Are you up for it? Of course you are, the virtual world is your oyster! Features: ⁃ 3600 immersive virtual environments ⁃ Various difficulty levels - Beginner, Intermediate, Semi-Pro, Professional along with a Practise Mode to get you on your way ⁃ 5 leagues - Face Pacers, Leg Spinners, Off Spinners, Swing bowlers & even Mystery spinners ⁃ State of the art graphics & animation ⁃ Professional Commentary
review_1: I have been playing cover drive cricket without any issue and thought ok lets try a new game also and the literally you can not hold the bat ,its like not the natural posture for holding,i tried 2-3 times but failed to hold it.
review_2: I am not sure if you've just ported this game from PCVR to Quest, but it's very annoying that it has a terrible bat alignment. I couldn't find any comfortable way of holding the controller in which I could grip the bat well. The fielders are stopping the ball by diving from literally 2 meters away. Bat's scale is totally unrealistic. Too much spin turn even with beginner difficulty. The whole delivery is readable (in terms of speed) until the ball lands on ground. Then it just goes with super speed, which is totally weird.
review_3: Has some good potential to be fully developed. Enjoy the basic gameplay can be repetitive
